name: Spellcraft (plasmastarfish, superduperpacman42, PolyB, Zebulah)
description:
Made by:

  • Plasmastarfish - Code, Music, character art
  • Zebulah - Code
  • Superduperpacman42 - Code
  • PolyB - Environment art, UI

All assets and game code made during the 7-day jam. "Engine" is forked from PyRoCore (Python Roguelike Core), a half-finished package to make roguelikes faster to develop in Python.

Fonts used:

  • Alagard
  • Smallest pixel
  • Pixantiqua
  • Island Roman

Our source code is available on Github.

Made in Python with PyGame.

More text incoming :)
